title: A Week In The Life, Vol 46.

author: Jessica
excerpt: We had another full week! How the heck is time flying by so fast?! Fall and winter skies are the best. Monday kicked off with this girl’s actual birthday! Sweetest soul alive! School drop off. Look at those cheeks! Waited in line for an hour. My lemon butter chicken. Did a giant batch of chocolate […]
text: We had another full week! How the heck is time flying by so fast?! Fall and winter skies are the best. Monday kicked off with this girl’s actual birthday! Sweetest soul alive! School drop off. Look at those cheeks! Waited in line for an hour. My lemon butter chicken. Did a giant batch of chocolate chip cookies for Max’s hockey tournament. Haircut cutie. Thursday and Friday were mine and my dad’s birthdays but I have no photo evidence! Except Emilia’s lipgloss. Her makeup in her mini caboodle is tooooo cute. Super quickly threw together this one pot chicken and orzo. The kids were off school Friday… one of her gifts was going to the climbing gym! She loves it. I can’t handle her cuteness. Epic trader joe’s run with this one. Where he promptly stuck the stickers all over him. Max had a hockey tournament in Buffalo! Love this shot. Cutie. We had a little cousin day out. Snowman cake pops for the win. Visited the toy store too. Emilia got so much hair chalk for her birthday – we tried to do a unicorn braid! Bowling & arcade fun for Cooper & Sebastian’s birthdays!! They love it. Meanwhile Max & Eddie took a little detour to Niagara Falls. Obsessed with him. The best birthday cake. As you can tell, this week is loaded with birthdays in our family! Blueberry pancakes are the fave around here. Perfection. Meanwhile, the boys finished up today and got home tonight! And I did lots of meal prep and made sourdough. Ready for the week!
html:
We had another full week!

How the heck is time flying by so fast?!

Fall and winter skies are the best.

Monday kicked off with this girl’s actual birthday! Sweetest soul alive!

School drop off. Look at those cheeks!

Waited in line for an hour.

My lemon butter chicken.

Did a giant batch of chocolate chip cookies for Max’s hockey tournament.

Haircut cutie.

Thursday and Friday were mine and my dad’s birthdays but I have no photo evidence! Except Emilia’s lipgloss.

Her makeup in her mini caboodle is tooooo cute.

Super quickly threw together this one pot chicken and orzo.

The kids were off school Friday… one of her gifts was going to the climbing gym!

She loves it.

I can’t handle her cuteness.

Epic trader joe’s run with this one.

Where he promptly stuck the stickers all over him.

Max had a hockey tournament in Buffalo!

Love this shot.

Cutie.

We had a little cousin day out.

Snowman cake pops for the win.

Visited the toy store too.

Emilia got so much hair chalk for her birthday – we tried to do a unicorn braid!

Bowling & arcade fun for Cooper & Sebastian’s birthdays!!

They love it.

Meanwhile Max & Eddie took a little detour to Niagara Falls.

Obsessed with him.

The best birthday cake.

As you can tell, this week is loaded with birthdays in our family!

Blueberry pancakes are the fave around here.

Perfection.

Meanwhile, the boys finished up today and got home tonight!

And I did lots of meal prep and made sourdough. Ready for the week!
